org.robobrain.sdk.graphics
Class Texture

java.lang.Object
  org.robobrain.sdk.graphics.Texture

public class Texture
extends java.lang.Object

Encapsulates an OpenGL texture. All textures must sized to a power of 2. (e.g. 32x32, 64x64, etc.)

Author:
James Johnson

Field Detail

loaded

public boolean loaded
Constructor Detail

Texture

public Texture(java.lang.String filename,
               int id,
               int glID,
               int width,
               int height)
Initializes a Texture.

Parameters:
filename - The path to the image in the assets folder.
id - The handle to the Texture in TextureManager.
glID - The Texture's OpenGL ID.
width - The width of the Texture in pixels.
height - The height of the Texture in pixels.

getFilename

public java.lang.String getFilename()
Gets the Texture's file name.

Returns:
A String containing the path to the Texture's image in the assets folder.
